website_summaries.verdict: A durable toiletry bag that will keep all of your things organized and easily accessible.
pros: Made of durable and lightweight ripstop waterproof fabric
Plenty of compartments for organized storage
cons: The bag is a little smaller than some customers expected

customer_reviews.title: This bag holds EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. You can get an amazing amount of stuff in it. It has zippered side pockets!! It can hang! There is so much room inside of it and inside also has net pockets and zippered sections. I keep it completely stocked and then just grab it and go. Great bag, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! Very well made and holds all of my toiletries. Thick and sturdy fabric. The color is not as bright in person.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: WOW Just what I needed for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this. It's super cute. Well made and the hanger option makes it so convenient to safe counter space...especially at hotels. There are so many inside pockets to hold travel size things and the 2 size compartments are tall enough for larger items. I can even fit my round brush and flat iron in the middle portion. I do wish the side pockets had 2 adjoining zippers (so I could put my curling iron that is too long) and secure it from falling out but otherwise it serves its purpose for my large perfume. The color is vibrant and it folds up nicely. Also doesnt weigh as much as other ones Ive had.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieB

customer_reviews.title: It so nice to leave everything in the bag and just hang ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 3-week trip to Austrailia. It hold most full size bottles of shampoo, not the jumbo size from the warehouse clubs. It's got lots of different areas to hold most of the toiletries for my hubby and I. I've now used it on 2 different trips. It so nice to leave everything in the bag and just hang the bag up on a robe hook or towel rack for easy access for things as you need them. It doesn't take up that much room in a suitcase either. Love it!!! The purple is a pretty color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Now when we go down to the beach house I can hang this bag on a door hook and have easy access to all my items for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I took all of my toiletry items and was able to put them all into my toiletry bag, although stuffed full it held everything including large bottles of shampoo and body soap. My toothpaste and brush head and brush and comb. My pre-shave lotion and electric shaver. My shower puff and deodorant can. Now when we go down to the beach house I can hang this bag on a door hook and have easy access to all my items for the bathroom without cluttering up the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Ron MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on an ongoing search for the perfect travel accessories and am very happy with this one. The Good: -It is the perfect size to fit ALL my beauty essentials in one bag without being bulky. -This one bag replaced three bags I carried for traveling -- one for eyeglasses, contacts etc; one for makeup; one for shower toiletries -- so everything is one place! -The pockets help keep everything organized and upright!! -Love the cheery pink color The Bad: -Nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything it claims to be: lots of pockets, a sturdy hanger, strong, durable materials. My first order arrived with a broken zipper. I notified the company and they were very apologetic. They asked for a picture, and quickly sent me a new bag. Sometimes mishaps happen, it's how you deal with them that makes the difference. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe everything on the internet.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most so far is that it seams well sewn together and the thought of the design but it needs to be bigger if I would have known it was this small I would not have bought it I was looking for just make up to put into it. You can’t put much else (like handcream,shampoo,conditioner,brush,comb, perfume,hair spray,etc. even travel size) it all doesn’t fit believe me I have tried so in the give away box it is going so on the look again but this time I think um going to look in the stores and not the internet.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag!  Despite its seemingly small size, it holds more than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Despite its seemingly small size, it holds more than I thought. The zippered pockets allow me to separate items as desired. The zippers work well and the fabric seems very durable. The side handle is really nice to allow you to carry it easily when you also have other things in your hands. I think it’s a bag that will last a long time. I bought the snow blue bag, the material is coarser than the standard bago material, It feels less industrial-like than the standard fabric. Really like it a lot; really cool new material from Bago, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: tracer

customer_reviews.title: The best Dopp kit for men (and women!)
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several items from Bago so I know that their items are great quality, and they have terrific customer service. When I received the email regarding the Dopp kit, I knew I had to buy one for my husband. He loved it. It has many pockets, keeps things organized, and has plenty of room despite not being overly large. In fact, I subsequently purchased one for myself before we went on a weekend trip. I love it, too! It is great quality and fantastic value. Thanks, Bago.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: I will simply and easily replace it with a small carabiner
customer_reviews.text: The size of this bag is deceptive. It appears small (smaller than the one it is replacing) and yet it holds everything I carried in the larger bag. I am a little concerned about the longevity of the small plastic hook from which it hangs, but should it break, I will simply and easily replace it with a small carabiner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and handy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack tons into it. My husband wanted one as soon as I got mine, so now we have two. His toiletries don't come close to filling all the space inside, but he loves it nonetheless. Being high maintenance myself, I happy fill it to capacity with all of my toiletries and keep makeup in a separate case, but I would imagine the average girl or guy would have plenty of room for everything they need. It even fits a small fold-able travel blow dryer. We also used these to transport a few olive oil bottles back from Greece so that they didn't break in our luggage and everything held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a clear bucket bag which I used for travel, sat nice if you had a large counter but was not able to hang it up which was cumbersome especially in smaller Euro/Asia bathrooms in hostels. Everything would get wet from the sink and the shower. When this came in I was really suspect that it would hold the same amount as my previous carrier. Was able to pack for a 3-week backpacking trip with even a little room to spare on the top. Shampoo, conditioner, body wash, face wash, face scrub, toner, full size toothpaste, loofah, various face creams, cotton pads/swabs, contact solution, etc. Everything fits!
customer_reviews.author: Pickles&Milk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. It fits everything I bring to travel with me. Its excellent quality, very good zippers as well. I always show it to my travel buddies while unpacking as I'm excited I finally have a tote that can hold my large amount of toiletries and still fit in my carryon sized bag with ease. The shape of it makes it stay slim even when fully packed. I will definitely be purchasing this item again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: i bought this bag thinking it was bigger. i put a full size body was in the picture so you guys can see. obiously when i go in a trip i will use travel size stuff. we are a family of 3 but i am not sure if all of our stuff will fit in this small bag thinking it was bigger but will give it a try will see if i can fit all our stuff because we are just traveling for 2 day dont newd much. i like the bag but for the price its not worth is because its too small.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Good bag / bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag...until the zipper broke. I only used it three times. ***UPDDATE 3/22/17 I have changed my two star review to 5 stars due to the CUSTOMER SERVICE reply to my unfortunate mishap. They replied immediately and were willing to rectify the problem. Extremely impressed (if only more companies were concerned with their product quality). Would definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Carey B

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space, expandable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase, I ended up buying two!!! It is so sleek and looks small, but it has so much space!! I was amazed at how much I could cram into this bag!! It's so well organized as well. We got stopped on our way home from Mexico and security was determined to catch me with larger liquids than allowed to fly with. Since the bag makes it so easy to organize your stuff, there was not a single issue with them looking through everything and for me to try and shove what they took out back in. I will 1million percent recommend this bag to everyone I know!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Benson

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than you think
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter but was disappointed at the size so I didn't give it to her. Although I had taken it out of the plastic bag I didn't "pull it" into shape. I wanted to return it but knew I wouldn't get to the post office so I reluctantly kept it. To my delight I used it this week end and actually really like it. I do wish it were bigger but for a short get away it holds quite a bit and I especially love all the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect! I have it all neatly organized and still ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using this as my makeup bag that I then set in the linen closet. I needed something to put all my makeup in since I have 2 toddlers who kept going in the bathroom drawer to play with my stuff. This is perfect! I have it all neatly organized and still have tons of room so finding what I want to use is fast and simple. It's a sturdy little bag with lots of zippers and places to keep it all nice and organized. I could easily see how this would be a great bag for traveling as well! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buckleymomma

customer_reviews.title: The hook is too small, the rest is good... with explanation.
customer_reviews.text: All in all the design of this toiletry bag is very good. It seems to be sturdy. I wish the mesh they used was more substantial. I am afraid it will rip out in due time. The hook needs to be bigger...and it should be metal, not plastic. You will not be able to hang this bag off a shower rod, a towel rod, a closet rod, or most anything else. This is a bad design decision on the manufacturers' part.
customer_reviews.author: Janlyn

customer_reviews.title: looks like picture
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need but I am not a fan of how boxy and thick it is. The shell or lining or something makes the frame firmer and when I am packing I don't like having to push so hard into it. The color is exactly as pictured, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: If you are like most women
customer_reviews.text: Size Matters. There is nothing wrong with this bag. I ordered and returned, so I can't comment on long term quality. I ordered this bag to hold my travel stuff. This bag is too small for my needs. If you are like most women, we have a lot of various items for travel. This bag is for travel size items, not full size items and does not hold anything additional beyond the basics in travel sizes. This bag did not provide space for a full size hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Betsill

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: because it’s so tiny barely anything fits in it. I really wish Amazon would make these suppliers use realistic or comparative photos in their ads. the dimensions are off as well. otherwise, this would be a fairly nice little makeup travel bag. currently we can fit 1 cell phone, a few tubes of lip gloss, 1 pair of sunglasses and it’s full.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: functionality
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited about traveling with this bag. It is very well made, it feels like good quality material and workmanship. It has so many pockets to hold tubes or travel bottles. It has great variety in size of pockets. I wanted a hanger on top - so that is great and nothing falls out when you open it up and hang it. I LOVE the variety of color options, it was hard to choose just one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel companion!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, durability and color options. It has several compartments for all your travel size toiletries. I like the mesh material on the inside because it will stay cleaner looking longer. The clear plastic (which is the other option on competitors products) seems good but it quickly picks up lotions residue and looks dirty. (IMO)
customer_reviews.author: Bev Murtagh

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty big, and I can fit a lot of travel sized items. But not big enough for many normal sized bathroom items, can probably fit two 16 oz bottles and some small lotions. Wasn’t able to fit some of my skincare products and hairbrush, but it’s still pretty nice
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great toiletry bag and an awesome color!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! I love the color, the shape, and the size. It has lot so interior mesh pockets to keep toiletries organized and in place. I travel for work, so when I pack, I pack each Sunday for the entire week. This bag allows me to take all of my toiletries, my contacts, etc., in one bag, and to keep them organized so when I open the bag, everything is still where I originally put it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's cool.
customer_reviews.text: There were a fair amount of loose strings on the one I purchased - a result of sloppy sewing. The design is great - well thought out pockets. I think the hanging hook can be a bit larger in diameter as well. It's a decent bag for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Needs some design improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag. Just returned from a weekend trip and can honestly say it carriers everything except my bottle of hairspray. I would prefer it to be just a bit bigger. It only gets 4 stars because the top handle is really small and the lack of a shoulder strap makes it really inconvenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Threw away my old toiletry bag as soon as this arrived and never looked back. Multiple netted slots, a zipper compartment and the open space on the inside stores various size cosmetics, hair aids, first aid and toiletry items while the zippered spaces on either side have additional space. Have not used the hideaway hook for hanging yet as it looks lightweight for what I carry.
customer_reviews.author: JazzY

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but too small for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice cosmetic case & similar to current 1 I have but smaller then expected & won’t hold all my things so I returned it —/should have ckd the size of this case before purchasing but didn’t think of it! Had to return it otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived used with random hair on it
customer_reviews.text: I would give this item 0 stars if I could. I pulled it out of the package and immediately saw hair (not my own) and white stuff all over the bag. So gross!! I was really looking forward to bringing this bag on vacation, but the thought of putting my toothbrush in a used, dirty bag makes me sink to my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Mueller

customer_reviews.title: nice-looking and useful bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the lime green, but more importantly, it's not too large a dopp bag like some that you can put full-size toiletries into (who does that these days). It can also be used to carry undergarments or all of those plugs, chargers, and misc. little items that one needs. A useful bag for a reasonable price...
customer_reviews.author: SibbyA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most organized my travel toiletries have EVER been. In the past I've used multiple organizers to hold my different products for hair, face, teeth, etc...what a hassle. Just used this bag on a one week cruise and it was perfect, held all of my toiletries, kept me organized and I could save space in that tiny cabin bathroom but hanging it on the door. Love the design, love the quality, love the color red!
customer_reviews.author: Love Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great travel for cruises
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this bag and finally ordered one. It has plenty of pockets and internal organizers for different items. Its construction is lightweight so it won't add much to your luggage weight. I really like the hanging feature which is useful on a cruise ship where space can be limited.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haddock

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly roomy for somewhat small bag...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this to carry my toiletries while traveling. I had a much larger bag that I loved but it was very old and beat up and had gotten unsightly. I was worried when this one arrived because it looked a little small, but actually it holds quite a lot and is very well designed. The hanging hook should be sturdier, but it works. I travel often, so we shall see about durability. But the side pockets are great for holding makeup brushes and eye pencils, floss, narrow items you want to keep separately. I found it surprisingly functional and it holds just about as much as my former, much larger bag held.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bruski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to find!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Bago Toiletry Bag and have already stuffed it full in preparation for my trip! Everything I need fits into the bag and there is still room for more. Love the bright color as my toiletry bag is now easy to find in my carry-on! Off on an adventure soon, and feeling prepared! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Koe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for 2wk vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Holds more than I thought by first looking at it out of the box! Very pleased to use this for a 14 day trip to Italy from USA. Held makeup brushes, travel hair dryer, travel straightener, travel-sized toiletries & all other basics. I have been traveling with 3 large pouches for toiletries&makeup stuff and this helped me consolidate it all. The color is more of a denim-ish look than the “metallic” description but other than that, great buy and will purchase again if needed. Zippers are good quality. Many smaller netting slots inside to hold various sized items. Thanks for helping me stay organized and streamline all my travel stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Loffert

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this it seemed a little small but when I filled it up with my necessities everything fit and it all stays in place, I don't need to rummage looking for things. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly designed to keep your toiletries in place
customer_reviews.text: I love all the little mesh compartments that keep my toiletries from being a jumbled mess. I was worried that the bag might be flimsy but I am happy to report that the bag is well constructed with thick rip stop fabric and holds it shape very well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but I wish the side pockets were tall enough for shampoo and conditioner bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Bago bag. The material is of great quality. The only thing I wish is that the two zipping side pockets were taller so that shampoo and conditioner bottles would fit nicely inside them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bag and am very pleased with the size and look of it. It's not too bulky but holds everything I need. The only small detraction is that it has a fairly strong odor initially, like a plastic-y manufacturing odor, so you have to rinse it and hang it outside to air out before using it. But that's a small matter. Just got back from a European trip with this bag; worked great and doesn't smell! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke (even before) the first time I used it!  But great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet kit seemed like a great idea and looked good, but one of the zippers broke (even before) the first time I used it. Very disappointing...poor quality. Update: Bago Customer Service was great! Replaced the product and I am hoping for the zippers to perform well on my upcoming trip to India.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dean

customer_reviews.title: The color is better than expected and quality seems very good.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and quality of the product. It feels sturdy and the zippers work flawlessly. I will review further after a few trips.
customer_reviews.author: Rpendo

customer_reviews.title: Another great Bago item
customer_reviews.text: All the Bago items we've purchased have been great. This kit is no exception. It's sturdy, folds up nicely and has all the features we were looking for in a shaving kit for travel. Nice hook, good size. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This a great dopp bag. I've had for about 2 months now and have used it about 10 days. It has room for everything I carry and I carry a lot. You can keep everything organized with easy access. The heavy brass zippers open and close with no jamming or catching on inside material. It is lined really nice and as a bonus its looks great. I'm real satisfied and would diffidently buy again if I can ever wear this out.
customer_reviews.author: L J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits a variety of toiletries, compactly
customer_reviews.text: Is just the right size to hold the basic toiletries for a couple. I would rate it a 5 Star if the interior compartments had more elastic and were a bit deeper. Most items just lay in the center of the bag. It appears to be of good construction and the zippers have been snag free.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: It seems well-designed for the various shapes and sizes of tolietries we need to pack.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Bogo hanging Toiletry bag. It is sturdy, and I was able to stash everything in ite for my most recent trip. As I've used it for only one trip, I cannot to its sturdiness or durabi;lity. It seems well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Binderman

customer_reviews.title: It really helps u stay organized!
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this bag was perfect for me.... It didn’t use up any counter space..... hung it on a hook in back of the bathroom door . After I used a product I slipped it right back in the space I provided for it.... I could always see what I need because of the clear plastic..... it works very well for travel.
customer_reviews.author: janice eubank

customer_reviews.title: GoTo Car Camping Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great little weekend travel bag. My husband has one too, he got his first. I tried to find a different one that worked great for car camping, but... Ended up with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Medea

customer_reviews.title: A really good travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent alternative to the much smaller "Overnighter". I don't worry anymore about extra things going into your bag. As an aside, your Dock Kit is one of the smallest and yet largest I have ever seen. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey L. Rohde Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Used as my toiletries back for a year while living abroad
customer_reviews.text: This bag works great! Lots of room for different items and easy to secure things if you don't want them rattling around. I loved the side pockets for things that I preferred to keep separate. Easy to wipe down on the outside and inside. Never used the hook so I can't speak to that. But it held up for over a year as I was living abroad and survived being thrown around in my suitcase during my travels after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toiletry bag I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I travel a fair amount so I waited to review this until I'd used it a few times. I'm amazed at how much I can put into this little thing and how well it packs into my luggage. The fact that it can hang on a towel bar or hook is also a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christina King

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a 2 week trip in another Country. Also, although advertised as a shaving kit for men...I am a woman. It exceeded my expectations. I was able to carry all my girl stuff (in travel containers) in it. It is a great container for travel...compact and complete.
customer_reviews.author: V. burgard

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag! It’s waterproof, it’s durable and it’s nice looking. My husband uses it a lot for travel and it’s held up so well.
customer_reviews.author: Tanza

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger bag so I could fit all my cosmetics in one place at home and for traveling. This bag meets all my expectations. I like having 3 different compartments. I like the mesh pockets and the zippered pockets in the largest one. The side pouches have bands that hold lipsticks, makeup brushes, or toothbrush in place, but I still have room for small tubes or bottles. I haven't used as a hanging bag yet, but I think that could be useful. The quality of the material and zippers is great, too. I recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer in WI

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much! I actually use it at home and hook it on the door! No issues so far and there are a decent amount of compartments for my make up storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these on a flash sale...one for my husband, my daughter, and myself. We all are happy with them. They have lots of compartments to hold toiletries, hairbands etc. I love how the items stand up. I have it on my vanity and hold all of my face wash, toner, creams etc. so they are right there to use and also out of sight when I'm done. Very durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Marting

customer_reviews.title: it's too small
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the dimensions so that is my fault. I could not fit my toiletries in this bag. It is pretty . Maybe if you are a teenager you can do it but it's not enough room for this old lady.
customer_reviews.author: Claudiam

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! It fit my TSA clear travel bag in the largest compartment, with room for additional items. The side pockets also held on simplified make up needs on one side and my oral care in the other. Great construction and feels good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Good size, multiple pockets and compartments to separate my travel necessities. This bag does everything I need when I travel, whether for a weekend away or a longer trip.
customer_reviews.author: RES

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed with this travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this travel bag. I purchased to replace one I bought form LL Bean years ago. This one is smaller which is what I wanted, but it still holds all of the stuff I had in my old, larger bag. Love the color, seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Bago Hanging Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this bag! Just what I needed to put in my carry-on bag to hold cosmetics and toiletries in a nice, neat organized manner. And that hook that allows you hang the bag up? Genius I tell you!
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toiletry bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toiletry bag ever. Strong zipper, so you can fill it up without worrying, you can easily see everything in one place, full size toiletries can fit, extra room on the left and right side for quick grab tall items like toothpaste and toothbrush. Strong built in hook.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Eve

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to travel
customer_reviews.text: Using this to replace an older, bulkier but similarly designed bag. Love that it doesn't have hard-ish plastic. Lightweight and will fit in carry-on or luggage better. Great color choices, too.
customer_reviews.author: TheReadingTub

customer_reviews.title: Bulky for My Travel Items
customer_reviews.text: I found the bag to be bulky in my suitcase. It would be perfect if there were about 3" less on the top, as I had nothing taller than that inside. My other issue was that when set on a counter, the lid wouldn't stay open easily, even when tucked behind. Overall is a very well-made bag, though, and I would probably be happier with a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Perrault

customer_reviews.title: Love the
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It’s exactly what I needed to replace my old Dopp kit. The pockets are great for storing my most commonly used items.
customer_reviews.author: Billy J Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stand up
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Nice quality & color, but it's not sturdy enough to stand which is annoying when trying to pack. Didn't stand well with stuff in it either so it only would work if you plan to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carpenetti

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Great product. Vibrant color.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toiletry bag. It fits all my products when I travel and keeps everything organized while I'm home.
customer_reviews.author: Teca Easy

customer_reviews.title: Good size. Not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as his old bag was stained and old. He likes this bag as a replacement. It holds everything he travels with. Seems very durable, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: donald e barker

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to store and organize all of my make up as I travel between 2 houses every week for school and this bag is great. It keeps all of my small items and brushes well organized and out of way. There is also enough space to toss in my moisturizer, toothbrush, and toothpaste when zipped up for travel. Feels well made, has held up to daily use for about 2 months and shows no signs of wear. Highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travel & the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and all of the compartments inside the bag. It appears to be made extremely well so i’m assuming it will be very durable. I had a shampoo spill inside the bag on my first plane trip and had to submerge the bag in water for cleaning. It washed up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: mburg

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect different colors helps to know who’s who!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my suitcase. Compartments hold all sizes of containers. The ability to hang and not have take in and out of bathroom was Great selling point.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to daily use
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily so my husband doesn’t have to deal with my bottles cluttering the sink counter. This will also be perfect for vacations. I hang it on the wall when I use the contents, and it has so many pockets, everything is contained nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Good fabric quality and color
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Good fabric quality and color. Zippers work well and seem sturdy. Glad to have a bag with a nice handle -- my old one didn't have one. My only suggestion (not really a complaint) is that the inside bottle pouches could be a bit larger. I use the refillable plastic "tubes" for shampoo, etc. There are three pouches but they were too small to get three of the tubes in.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love my travel bag. It's perfectly sized to stow full size products and with pockets and zippered sections to keep it all secure!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than more expensive similar bags
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It holds so much, yet it's compact and sturdy. The design of the side pockets are great and work nicely as a traveling cabinet keeping things neat and organized. It held everything we needed for an 8 day trip. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best travel product I have ever purchased!! Holds everything for my husband and myself for 2 weeks travel, minus 3-1-1. ( including all my makeup and brushes) Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything!
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy. It fits everything I need and then some! I use it all of the time, whether at home or traveling so everything is in one place and I just have to zip it up and put it in my suitcase. The hook at the top of the flap is handy too, it keeps it open while preventing it from toppling over and spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Lulibell

customer_reviews.title: This toiletry bag is one of the best quality toiletry bags I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th time ordering Bago bags from Amazon. This toiletry bag is one of the best quality toiletry bags I have found, and the prices of Bago Bags are only one quarter to one third the price of other similar bags! The customer support and contact is above and beyond anything you will get elsewhere as well. This is a company that really cares about their products and their customers.You cant go wrong with any Bago bag purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stand up, and you have to dig things out.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, looks durable, might suit if you were taking lots of hair products--I don't. Won't stand up, and you have to dig things out.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Kept me organized
customer_reviews.text: I have several toiletry bags. I use different bags depending on where I go. This one is the best, it's compact and holds a great deal of products. Everything is so easy to find. Perfect size to hang in the bathroom and pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Barrile

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: This does what I need it to do. My only complaint is the hook is tiny and doesn't always hook to things I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag after having used their packing cubes. It is the perfect size for traveling. I also bought another set of the packing cubes. They make organizing your luggage so much easier and clothes to not shift around to get wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have one already, but since I liked it so much I got 2 for my daughters. Will be a great addition to their travel accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Otakar Sroubek

customer_reviews.title: Good pric and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Quality bag. I travel about 60% of time mostl international. Holds everything I need and then some. So far zippers and bag quality good. Replaced one I had for over 10 years. Expect to get same out of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Don Beahm

customer_reviews.title: Roomy enough for a a 4 week road trip
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for a 4 week road trip. Roomy, versatile held up very well. Items are visible for easy access. Gets my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: myamie1

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tote! Exactly as expected, it’s very quality and a great price for what you get. It has great little organizers inside and is perfect for some who want to travel organized. Maybe not suitable for someone who’s bats their bottles standing up - in this tote you will have to put them on their side in order to make them fit.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Weil

customer_reviews.title: Small and not functional
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so small-the side pockets take away from the interior space. Most of my pocket items are too long to let the side pockets zip so travel is difficult. I basically had to buy another bag.
customer_reviews.author: Flee ATL

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think and what video leads you to believe
customer_reviews.text: This product is small. It may be five for lip sticks and make up but larger men’s items fill it up. I do not have enough space to put all of my toiletries in it. I should have sent it back but I attempted to use it. I will go back to my old travel toiletries bag.
customer_reviews.author: Graham W.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Convenient, holds a lot, perfect for traveling or just keep everyoff the counter in your bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Jessy M.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot unzip side pocket - there are 3 spots it gets stuck. Went to use it for trip & kept stopping at thread marks on zipper. Attempted to register warranty on 7/20/18 - difficult. I still have tag on it - couldn’t use for trip to Vegas 6/9/19.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t travel without this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t travel without this bag! I absolutely LOVE it. It fits everything I need and the pockets are excellent. This is one of my favorite items I own. I will definitely be buying some at Xmas to give to family!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: Good sized toiletry bag. Appears to be well-made. I like the upright accordion-style side pockets which helps to keep things in place. Pleased with the multiple mesh pockets to keep wet items aerated. Overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my cosmetics organized while traveling
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to put my cosmetics and personal care items in. While traveling and this has worked well. The hook for hanging is a good size and is strong. I would probably buy a larger one if I had it to do over, but this works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bago Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a wedding anniversary present for my husband. I wanted to order that travel bag because my husband didn't have a travel bag for years. I can't find the old one somewhere. I don't know what happened to it. I gave the old one to him as a birthday present several years ago so I replaced it with a new travel bag. My husband really like it. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size & Organization
customer_reviews.text: After returning two other hanging toiletries kits I finally found one to keep. It’s the perfect size for carry on luggage but also holds a lot of products. Prime shipping and free returns but no need to return. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the bag and the side pockets. The zipper on the inside flap pocket is too small to get your hand in making the pocket basically useless. If they redesigned so the zipper is at the widest part it of the pocket I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: funthreads

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, size, & access to toiletries
customer_reviews.text: Great design, holds a lot & gives you visible access to everything when hung. The bag itself is very durable material, feels like it's high quality, & even came packaged in a super heavy duty ziplock bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LuluNlalaland

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who travels for work all over the world. He loves it! It kept his products organized, it fits full sized bottles, and can be packed in his suitcase without worrying about leaking.
customer_reviews.author: chandalar rector

product_meta.title: Bago Hanging Toiletry Bag For Women & Men - Leak Proof Travel Bags for Toiletries with Hanging Hook & Inner Organization to Keep Items From Moving - Pack Like a PRO (Black)
feature_bullets: ALWAYS KEEP YOUR PERSONAL BELONGINGS ORGANIZED: If you are on the road traveling a lot, you know that between cosmetics and makeup, shaving kit, shampoos, combs, personal hygiene products and other small to medium-sized accessories, it can get pretty chaotic! Why not be 100% organized next time you travel with your very own hanging toiletry bag by Bago?

ALL THE SPACE YOU MIGHT NEED –AND MORE: When it comes to travel essentials bags and organizers, size does matter! That’s why our toiletry bag is spacious, compact and large enough to fit all your accessories and essentials from make-up and razors to shaving foam, toothbrush/paste, soaps, shampoos, jewelry and so much more! Keep everything organized in one place and you’ll never misplace a thing again!

DESTINED TO ACCOMPANY YOU FOR A LONG TIME: The Bagotraveling organizer is made exclusively with durable and lightweight Rip-Stop Honeycomb waterproof fabric that will protect your items inside. Each bag is durably stitched and equipped with heavy-duty zippers so that it becomes your most valued companion for years to come!

DESIGNED TO GIVE YOU OPTIONS: Our travel toiletry bag can be used to store art supplies, as a lunch bag, baby bag or even for electronic gadgets. With multiple pockets and multiple compartments, you have a wide array of options when it comes to using the bag. Plus, it comes in 7 different colors so that you can choose according to your own personal style!

THE BEST GO-TO TRAVEL ESSENTIALS BAG OR YOUR MONEY BACK:The Bago travel bag was meant to make your traveling comfortable and convenient by organizing your necessities, cosmetics and accessories right at your hand without having to dig or dump everything out to get to what you need. If however, you are not 110% thrilled with our toiletry bag, get in touch with us and we’ll be more than happy to send your money back!
